message: Bob, I believe this product presents a fantastic opportunity for you, even more so than you might realize. I'm happy to open negotiations at $1,500,000.
I appreciate your time, Alice. I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
Bob, I appreciate your offer and your understanding of the value this product brings. To be fair, I'm making some concessions myself. Could we settle at $1,350,000?
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit concerned about the price. Would you be willing to meet me at $1,250,000?
